00032 void bundler_inters_feature::mark_as_contributing()
00033 {
00034     assert(track);
00035     track->contributing_points[index_in_track] = true;
00036 }
00037 
00038 bool bundler_inters_feature::is_contributing() const
00039 {
00040     return track && track->contributing_points[index_in_track];
00041 }

00043 //----------Bundler Inters Image Impls---------------------
00044 void bundler_inters_image::remove_if_present(
00045     bundler_inters_feature_sptr const& f)
00046 {
00047     features.erase(
00048         remove(features.begin(), features.end(), f),
00049         features.end());
00050 }

00052 //----------Bundler Inters Match Set Impls---------------------
00053 bundler_inters_match_set::bundler_inters_match_set()
00054 {
00055     inlier_percentage = INLIER_PERCENT_NOT_SET;
00056 }
00057 
00058 int bundler_inters_match_set::num_features() const
00059 {
00060     return matches.size();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void bundler_inters_match_set::add_match(
00064     bundler_inters_feature_sptr f1,
00065     bundler_inters_feature_sptr f2)
00066 {
00067     bundler_inters_feature_pair p =
00068         vcl_make_pair<
00069             bundler_inters_feature_sptr,
00070             bundler_inters_feature_sptr>(f1, f2);
00071 
00072     matches.push_back(p);
00073 
00074     reset_inlier_percentage();
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 void bundler_inters_match_set::remove_feature(int index)
00079 {
00080     matches.erase(matches.begin() + index);
00081     reset_inlier_percentage();
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void bundler_inters_match_set::clear()
00086 {
00087     matches.clear();
00088     reset_inlier_percentage();
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 double bundler_inters_match_set::get_homography_inlier_percentage(
00093     int num_rounds, double thresh_sq) const
00094 {
00095     if (inlier_percentage == INLIER_PERCENT_NOT_SET)
00096     {
00097         inlier_percentage = bundler_utils_get_homography_inlier_percentage(
00098                 *this, thresh_sq, num_rounds);
00099     }
00100 
00101     return inlier_percentage;
00102 }
00103 
00104 class match_remover
00105 {
00106   public:
00107     match_remover(bundler_inters_feature_sptr const& f): f(f) { }
00108 
00109     bool operator()(bundler_inters_feature_pair const& p){
00110         return p.first == f || p.second == f;
00111     }
00112 
00113   private:
00114     bundler_inters_feature_sptr const& f;
00115 };
00116 
00117 void bundler_inters_match_set::remove_if_present(
00118     bundler_inters_feature_sptr const& f)
00119 {
00120     match_remover remover(f);
00121 
00122     matches.erase(
00123         remove_if(matches.begin(), matches.end(), remover),
00124         matches.end());
00125 
00126     reset_inlier_percentage();
00127 }
00128 
00129 void bundler_inters_match_set::reset_inlier_percentage()
00130 {
00131     inlier_percentage = INLIER_PERCENT_NOT_SET;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 //----------------Tracks Implementations--------------------------
00136 void bundler_inters_track::remove_if_present(
00137     bundler_inters_feature_sptr const& f)
00138 {
00139     points.erase(
00140         remove(points.begin(), points.end(), f),
00141         points.end());
00142 
00143     contributing_points.assign(points.size(), false);
00144 }
